data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Adler, Peter H. (2018): Roger Ward Crosskey-The Life and Contributions of an Entomologist par Excellence (1930 - 2017). Zootaxa 4455 (1): 35-67, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4455.1.2|5 occurrences
